name: Eerie Mountain
description:
Hello everyone! 

this is a new horror game of mine that i have been working on for quite some time now, would be appreciated if you give it a go and let me know how it goes!

Headphones are heavily recommended.

It takes around 10-15 minutes to play through.

Story:

You are playing as a forest ranger that is going to investigate a sudden missing family on the Eerie Mountain.

Controls:

WASDWalkEInteractTStop interact FFlashlightESCPause menu
